content.question: The writer wants to develop the discussion of Jane Chu’s performance experiences in sentences 13 and 14. Which of the following, if added after sentence 14, would best accomplish this goal?

choices.label: A narrative about how Chu first became interested in music and why she started playing the piano
Contrasting descriptions of how Chu felt when she played music and how she felt when she interacted with people in nonmusical contexts
An explanation of why Chu’s family decided to move from China to the United States
A detailed description of the National Endowment for the Arts, including when and why it was founded and the scope of its mission today

content.answer: Contrasting descriptions of how Chu felt when she played music and how she felt when she interacted with people in nonmusical contexts

skill.text: Skill 6.C: Use appropriate methods of development to advance an argument.
